step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Try to bring your shoulder blades together and down smoothly.
Great job on the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second rep starting well. Focus on a controlled circular motion.
Excellent! Continue to squeeze your shoulder blades back and down.
Fantastic finish! You're doing a great job regaining shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when rolling back to help with breathing and oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work!
